Title: The Crow: Salvation
Writer: James O'Barr (comic book series), Chip Johannessen
Actors: Kirsten Dunst, William Atherton, Debbie Fan, Eric Mabius
Plot: The third entry in 'The Crow' series follows Alex Corvis, who was framed for the murder of his girlfriend and is executed. he is then brought back from the dead by a crow when the legend says 'Love is stronger than death'. He returns to discover that a corrupt police force is behind her murder and for him to go after the killers, he must find out the mystery behind everything that happened.
Production: Jeff Most Productions, Pacifica Film Distribution, Fallen Bird Productions, Edward R. Pressman Film Corp., IMF
